website_summaries.verdict: A durable lower end trailer tire that is manufactured for both long and short journeys.
pros: Freestar has designed a tire that is suitably durable and reasonably priced to provide the customer with value
These tires have an acceptable tread life and offer above average stability and traction on a wide variety of terrains
cons: As with any item sold in large quantities, occasionally there are inferior tires that slip through quality control

customer_reviews.title: Early blow out
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the tires and the price. They shipped fast and were less than a year old. I had them mounted and balanced at a tires shop. For my first road trip, I inflated the tires to 80 psi cold. I have a 7800 travel trailer with double axles. About 300 miles into the trip 1 of the 4 blew. I did not hit anything, it was at night, I was doing 65 and I didn't run off the road. In fact, it was a smooth road. I can't explain what happened. I was able to continue another 1100 miles without any of the 3 remaining failing, but I am concerned that they might.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my page gt 24ft enclosed trailer. Havent had them on the road yet. If i have issues with them ill update the review. Look like decent tires. No deformation of the tread or sidewall like cheaper tires. Mounted there was no abnormal bulges in the sidewall. Spinning them they looked pretty true. Overall they seem like a decent tire. Only complaint is i had to let them sit a week stretched out so i could mount them on my wheels. But, so far, i would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: For trailer service only, unbelievable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I recieved these tires yesterday went to mount them today since I'm leaving on vacation and wanted new tires for the trip. What the hell, I can't use the because they are stamped " for trailer service only" I ORDERED TRAILER TIRES, NOT SPARE TIRES. There goes my trip, not enough time to order different tires. Unbelievable!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Great tire with a great price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these tires for my 6x12 trailer. They came very fast ordered them on a Monday, delivered Thursday. The tires look great, deep tread, stiff side walls. I highly recommend these tires for you trailer.
customer_reviews.author: bryan burke

customer_reviews.title: One Of The Best
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for about 15 years now and they perform better than names like Carlisle. They withstand the grueling conditions associated with commercial landscape use.
customer_reviews.author: G.Newman

customer_reviews.title: Amazon dropped the ball.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered load range D tires, received load range E. Because of time sensitivity I will have to use the E tires and accept the increased wear. Next time will go local for tires.
customer_reviews.author: Rich M

customer_reviews.title: It is black and round!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I saved $20.00 off the tire store price..... The tire was very easy to mount and air up. It holds weight very well with out getting hot running on the road. P.S. it is made in Vietnam. Not much else I can add.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona kid

customer_reviews.title: good trailer tires
customer_reviews.text: i buy these on amazon because they are cheaper and same quality as store. good tires in a load e
customer_reviews.author: aussompossum

customer_reviews.title: Great Trailer Tire . . .
customer_reviews.text: Just mounted them, seem like really great tires !! They are replacing the F-108 same company. Loved them too !! Highly recommend . . .
customer_reviews.author: 20YearAirForceVeteran

customer_reviews.title: They are "A" Great Tire For The Price !
customer_reviews.text: The Tire's is just What "I" Needed , I Like Them Very Much ! When "I" Need to Buy any More "I" Will Buy This Same Type Tires !
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Good enough.
customer_reviews.text: Seem like a quality tire so far. These are on a boat trailer that gets hauled 100ish miles per trip, ~20 times a year.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Not the tire in the advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Previously ordered 4 of these and they were as advertised, 1 was getting worn decided to replace so ordered another, was not the tire advertised,not freestar, and not 10 ply was 8 ply. Will probably go elsewhere next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It;s A little thinner base on the numbers of the tire and it looks like is starting to wear fast
customer_reviews.text: This tine is average and the numbers dimensions don't look as accurate as other brands
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Tire looks good and has been good so far. Price was super
customer_reviews.author: rickey rogers

customer_reviews.title: Installed on camper
customer_reviews.text: Put these on my 6500 lbs camper and seem to be good. 10 ply, pulled nice. Time will tell so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: CJM

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these for my horse trailer. Never had one issue!!
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be a great tire. Date code was only a few months old which was very surprising to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Jolly

customer_reviews.title: Nice tire
customer_reviews.text: Nice tire for the money, I use it on a utility trailer and it's been working great.
customer_reviews.author: Grady

customer_reviews.title: Economical!
customer_reviews.text: If you need a good trailer tire at a reasonable price, these are a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Lori W.

customer_reviews.title: Tires
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our camper and were very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: E rated
customer_reviews.text: These are e rated tires.I just recently installed no run time history yet.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to try them
customer_reviews.text: With this covid thing and everything shut down, I haven't been able to go anywhere. They look pretty good. Can't wait to try them.
customer_reviews.author: mike b.

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of them now on trailers they are a good tire.
customer_reviews.author: Karyl Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more when needed
customer_reviews.text: For the price and using them for the work trailers I could complain one bit about the tires. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Decent tires
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded my trailer tires from load D to load E tires. This tires fit the rims great and look very decent. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Rim
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with rim! I made a huge mistake and bought this for our spare tire for our trailer but it had no rim and no one would put a rim on it. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great tires fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great tires so far arrived promptly think I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Mayes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tires for the money
customer_reviews.text: Long lasting tire. Wears good and doesn’t dry rot like junk tires.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Tires arrived and they are only 2ply tires not 10 ply as shown and as advertised

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price and seems to be a good quality tire

customer_reviews.title: great deal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tire, Great value..

customer_reviews.title: Good tires
customer_reviews.text: Good looking tires. Haven't driven with them yet but being 10 ply tires they should last.

customer_reviews.title: Round and made of rubber
customer_reviews.text: I have four of these bad boys on my 10k car trailer and no one has died yet.

product_meta.title: Freestar M-108+ Trailer Radial Tire-ST225/75R15 117L
product_meta.description: Trailer Tire Radial 225/75R15 ST225/75R15D Load Range D 2540# 65 PSI. Tire Size: 225/75R15. Aspect Ratio: 75. Section Width: 8.7. Load Range: D. Tire Weight Rating: 2540 Lbs.. Maximum Pressure: 65 PSI. Tire Composition: 8 Ply. Tread Depth: 8.4/32". Sidewall Description: BSW. Speed Index: M. Load Index: 113/108. Overall Diameter: 28.3". Internal Tire Type: Tubeless. Warranty: Five Years. Pack Quantity - 1 Unit
feature_bullets: Tire Weight Rating: 2540 Lbs. Max. Pressure: 65 PSI

Compatible with popular boat trailer brands such as Alumacraft, Continental, Crestliner, Karavan, Lund, Mako, Nitro, Ranger, Regency, River Pro, Sea Ray, Smoker Craft, Stratos, Striper, Sun Tracker, Tahoe, Tracker, Triton, Triumph, Warrior and Yamaha.

Compatible with popular utility and cargo trailer brands such as Big Tex, Carry-On, E-Z Hauler, FastTrac, Lark United, Miska, Performance Trailers, PJ, Quality Trailers, Remeq, Road Force, Teske, Top Hat, Triple Crown and Wells Cargo.
